distinct

order by ${orderByClause}

update version_feature_sync_data
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
require_id = #{record.requireId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{record.branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update version_feature_sync_data set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, require_id = #{record.requireId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, branch_id = #{record.branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operate_type = #{record.operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cmp_sync_result = #{record.cmpSyncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, itc_sync_result = #{record.itcSyncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_uid = #{record.createUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_uid = #{record.updateUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenant_code = #{record.tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

require_id = #{requireId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT},

itc_sync_result = #{itcSyncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update version_feature_sync_data set require_id = #{requireId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cmp_sync_result = #{cmpSyncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, itc_sync_result = #{itcSyncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_uid = #{createUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_uid = #{updateUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenant_code = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into version_feature_sync_data ( require_id, branch_id, project_id, operate_type, create_uid, create_time, tenant_code ) values
( #{item.requireId}, #{item.branchId}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.operateType}, #{item.createUid}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.tenantCode} )
mapper.select: select * from version_feature_sync_data where id >= ( select id from version_feature_sync_data where cmp_sync_result in (-1,0) order by id limit #{startIndex},1 ) and cmp_sync_result in (-1,0) order by id limit #{pageSize}
